channel.title: The Mopar Anti-Intelligence Classification System
channel.description:
In a sudden stroke of inspiration, I decided it is time to document this overwhelming phenomenon of mindless fucktards who flood our forums with useless drivel (moparscapers). Therefore, behold the Mopar Anti-Intelligence Classification System (MACS). It is a set of desriptions for defining the (lack of) intelligence of a given person on the Internet. The system consists of several MACS levels, described below.
[ul][li]Neanderthal [list] [li]Should be extinct[/li] [li]Does not speak a language, fails at all attempts of communication[/li] [li]Incapable of thought, relies on instinct and luck[/li] [li]Supposed to have died out after excessive inbreeding[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Cro-Magnon [list] [li]Significantly less evolved than normal humans[/li] [li]Understands concept of basic tools, fails miserably when trying to utilize them[/li] [li]Can attempt to communicate with others of its kind[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Sub-Moronic [list] [li]Can form primitive communication structures that can be deciphered with effort by an experienced cryptographer[/li] [li]Capable of copying others ideas to a limited extent[/li] [li]Lacks many of the basic literacy skills required to advance in intelligence rankings[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Moronic [list] [li]Speaks an obscure dialect of English, void of any form of grammar or multi-syllable words[/li] [li]Capable of asking questions, but not able to understand any supplied answers[/li] [li]Known use an excessive amount of glyphs known as “smileys” in an attempt to enhance their communications[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Idiotic [list] [li]Capable of communication with limited and seemingly random use of language constructs[/li] [li]Not able to understand basic commands or rules given by authoritative figures[/li] [li]Competent enough to plagiarize another person’s work, but not enough to successfully claim it as their own[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Dumb [list] [li]Known to discuss axiomatic subjects at length for no determinable reason[/li] [li]Commonly degrades any form of discussion into a recursive argument[/li] [li]Is known to be capable of reading up to a paragraph in one sitting, but often not intelligent enough to realize when it would be beneficial to do so[/li] [/list] [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]The MoparScaper is a particularly interesting species. [list] [li]Commonly Sub-Moronic or Moronic[/li] [li]Occasionally advances to Idiotic level[/li] [li]Dumb level is mostly achieved by cases that began at an Idiotic level[/li] [li]Rare in the normal population, Cro-Magnon and Neanderthal level intelligences are found relatively frequently in the MoparScape population [list] [li]This is likely attributed to the lack of the survival of the fittest rule on the Internet[/li] [/list] [/li] [/list] [/li][/ul]
I have taken the time to devise this flow chart, which will enable you to easily determine the anti-intelligence classification of a given person.
[img]http://troll.ws/i/mfHFSC.png[/img]
In closing, I hope you find this useful in your future forum endeavours. I trust it will be used as a standard in identifying the usefulness of members on these boards.
